p.span: ​We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Client Services Director to lead and oversee our client engagement strategies and relationships within our reputable offshoring company. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in client services management, a deep understanding of offshoring operations, and a proven track record of driving exceptional customer satisfaction, business growth, sales, and account building.

div.class: container o_colored_level o_animate o_visible o_grid_item o_anim_slide_in o_anim_from_right shadow

p.span: As the Client Services Director, you will play a pivotal role in cultivating and strengthening our client partnerships, ensuring seamless service delivery, driving sales initiatives, and building lasting accounts. You will lead a team of client services professionals, collaborate cross-functionally, and drive initiatives that enhance our clients' overall experience while aligning with the company's strategic goals.
You will provide the best service to our partner brands by performing these tasks:

li.span: Establish and nurture strong relationships with key clients, acting as a trusted advisor and strategic partner.
Understand clients' business objectives, challenges, and opportunities, and propose tailored solutions that align with their needs.
Proactively identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities to expand the scope of services provided.
Drive sales efforts by identifying new business opportunities, presenting solutions, and negotiating contracts.
Develop and execute account management strategies to foster long-term partnerships and maximize client retention.
Collaborate with the sales team to align sales strategies with client needs and ensure a seamless transition from sales to service.
Lead and inspire a team of client services managers, fostering a culture of excellence, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
Provide coaching, mentorship, and professional development to team members, ensuring their growth and success.
Ensure that client expectations are consistently met or exceeded by monitoring service performance and resolving any issues that arise.
Collaborate closely with operations teams to ensure seamless execution of services, quality assurance, and adherence to SLAs.
Develop and execute strategic client engagement plans, identifying opportunities to enhance value, optimize processes, and drive operational efficiency.
Collaborate with senior leadership to align client services strategies with the overall company goals.
Act as the primary point of contact for escalated client inquiries, concerns, or feedback, ensuring prompt and effective resolution.
Provide regular status updates, performance reports, and insights to clients to demonstrate the value delivered by our services.
Stay informed about industry trends, competition, and market dynamics, and proactively recommend strategies to stay ahead of the curve.
Identify and propose innovative solutions and offerings that add value to clients' operations and address evolving needs.
Proven experience (8 years) in a senior client services role within an offshoring, outsourcing, or similar industry.
Demonstrated success in managing complex client relationships, driving client satisfaction, achieving revenue growth, and building accounts.
Strong understanding of offshoring operations, processes, and best practices.
Exceptional leadership and team management skills, with a track record of building and developing high-performing teams.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
Strategic thinker with the ability to identify and capitalize on opportunities for business expansion.
Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving performance metrics, sales targets, and client-centric outcomes.
Proficiency in CRM systems and project management tools.
